options.content:
## Story Node Monitoring dashbord by pro-nodes75

![pro-nodes75 logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/the-node75/about-us/main/resources/logo_128x128.png "logo")

Project link: [https://github.com/the-node75/mon_story](https://github.com/the-node75/mon_story)

targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "swap" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "path" = '/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("gauge") FROM "cometbft_consensus_height" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cometbft_consensus_height" with Key= "chain_id" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/)
SELECT last("gauge") FROM "cometbft_p2p_peers" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("gauge") / 1000 FROM "cometbft_consensus_validator_power" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description: Number of validators who tried to double sign

targets.query: SELECT last("gauge") FROM "cometbft_consensus_validator_missed_blocks" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Validator missed blocks

targets.query: SELECT last("gauge") FROM "cometbft_consensus_validators" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description: Number of validators who did not sign

targets.query: SELECT last("gauge") FROM "cometbft_consensus_missing_validators" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Missing Validators

panels.description: Number of validators who tried to double sign

targets.query: SELECT last("gauge") FROM "cometbft_consensus_byzantine_validators" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Byzantine Validators

targets.query: SELECT last("gauge") FROM "cometbft_consensus_height" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("counter")  / 1 FROM "cosmos_tx_count" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("counter")  / 1 FROM "cosmos_tx_successful" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("gauge")  / 1 FROM "cometbft_consensus_total_txs" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("gauge") FROM "cometbft_p2p_peers" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description: Total voting power of all validators

targets.query: SELECT last("gauge")  / 1000 FROM "cometbft_consensus_validators_power" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("gauge")  / 1000 FROM "cometbft_consensus_missing_validators_power" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Consensus Validators Voting Power

panels.description: Consensus chain size since node restart

targets.query: SELECT last("counter")  / 1 FROM "cometbft_consensus_chain_size_bytes" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Consensus chain size

targets.query: SELECT last("gauge")  / 1 FROM "cosmos_tx_gas_used" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("gauge")  / 1000 FROM "cosmos_minted_tokens" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("counter") FROM "cometbft_p2p_peer_send_bytes_total" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("counter")  / 1 FROM "cometbft_p2p_peer_receive_bytes_total" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT derivative(last("counter"), 1s) FROM "cometbft_p2p_peer_send_bytes_total" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT derivative(last("counter"), 1s) FROM "cometbft_p2p_peer_receive_bytes_total" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("gauge")  / 1 FROM "cometbft_mempool_active_outbound_connections" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("gauge")  / 1 FROM "cometbft_mempool_size" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("gauge")  / 1 FROM "cometbft_mempool_size_bytes" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("gauge")  / 1000000 FROM "process_resident_memory_bytes" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("gauge")  / 1000000 FROM "process_virtual_memory_bytes" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description: Number of opened file descriptors by node process

targets.query: SELECT last("gauge")  / 1 FROM "process_open_fds" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Opened file descriptors

targets.query: SELECT mean("m1") FROM "geth.p2p/ingress/eth/68/0x00.meter" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT "m1" FROM "geth.txpool/valid.meter" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "m1" FROM "geth.txpool/valid.meter" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "m1" FROM "geth.txpool/valid.meter" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter

list.description:
SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host
SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: Host
list.name: host
